name: Karashuta
description:
You are playing as a drone in a space station, with the goal to destroy all non-human life. Use your shield to absorb enemy bullets of the same color, while also increasing your power with them. But beware: enemies can only be hit by their same color.

This project was made at S4G School for Games during a gamejam. Throughout the next 2 months our small team is aiming to develop this prototype into a complete game throughout many weekly updates.
